# AppExtensionPoint.Capabilities

**Structure**

The capabilities that an your extension implements

## Declaration

```swift
struct Capabilities
```

## Overview

When creating a binding in your app extension, use this type to specify the capabilities implemented by the app extension.

## Structures

- **AppExtensionPoint.Capabilities.Builder**

- **init(_:)**: Creates capabilities specifying the
